description: These are tables for quickly generating a name for a pub, tavern, inn, or the like.

table_entries.entry: Roll one result from the [Adjective] table and one result from the [Noun 1] table and combine them as follows: "The [Adjective] [Noun 1]"
Roll two results from the [Noun 1] table and combine them as follows: "The [Noun 1A] and [Noun 1B]" or "The [Noun 1A] and the [Noun 1B]"
Roll one result from the [Noun 1] table and one result from the [Noun 2] table and combine them as follows: "The [Noun 1]'s [Noun 2]" or "The [Noun 1] and the [Noun 2]"
Roll one result from the [Verb] table and one result from the [Noun 1] table and combine them as follows: "The [Verb] [Noun 1]"

title: Pub Names
